name: Superstar Secret Love Story
description:
Are you a fashion hungry person? For all those fashionista & superstar who covet fashion design sense and wish to try unique fashion styles. Show your fashion fantasy & apply makeup to your beauty star get ready for a romantic beach party with her high school crush. Try out Superstar Secret Love Story game, its the summer season’s hottest fashion styles secret love story game. Let’s see who wore it best at the fashion show or photoshoot. Pick fashion designer stylist girl dresses or outfits, gorgeous cosmetics to create endless fancy beauty makeover for the summer beach party & photoshoot. Feel the real experience of makeup & show your fashion fantasy with items especially designed for special occasions like a romantic beach date with a summer crush. As a famous fashion stylist, show your fashion fantasy to surprise the girls with the best beauty makeover ever so that they can enjoy a romantic beach date with their boyfriends or secret lover. Make use of the hottest tips and the latest trends while doing your beauty makeover in this fashion styles secret love story game. Become a fashion stylist girl & do amazing hairstyles, exquisite designer outfits or dresses, vibrant lipsticks, beautiful eye shadows for your ultimate fashion fantasy world.

You’re the hottest new fashion stylist girl in Hollywood, and your awesome reputation is already bringing you fame & dream girl! Dress up famous fashion models & Superstar for secret love story romantic beach party. Bring out their superstar style and give star celebrity beautiful model makeover in fashion secret love story game! Ask your model to hop in the beauty salon chair and get dolled up with eye shadow, lipstick, facial powder and much more just like a Hollywood superstar. Superstar need to socialize, so hang out with your fellow celebrities and go on romantic secret love story beach date as a party queen with your summer crush. From magazine cover photoshoots to red carpet movie premieres, it’s your job to give your superstar clients beauty makeover that will help them being a party queen in the crowd! The road to superstardom requires fabulous stilettos, high end designer clothes & glamorous hair! Help your superstar models win lots of fashion catwalk and photoshoot! Start with a soothing spa to make sure the girl’s hair and skin are flawless. Cleanse, scrub and moisturize star celebrity skin using high end treatments. Have mud musk to remove impurities and finish with toner to brighten skin! Now the face becomes clean instantly. Next, apply mask, remove acnes and remove naps of eyebrow. Wash the girl face with soap until bubbles cover all over the face and then rinse the face. After your superstar girl is done with the spa treatment, give the best beauty makeover to make star celebrity look special and amazing. You can choose the awesome hair color with pretty hairdo, changing eyebrows color and eye color with contact lenses. Make superstar girl wear attractive colored eyelashes mascara, eyeliner, eye shades, blushon makeup and tattoos. Later decorate star celebrity's pinky lips by glittery and shinning gloss. Lastly select sparkling earrings to make star celebrity feel like a glamor model girl. Enhance natural beauty with eyeshades, eyelashes, blush on & better not miss any of them in order to make the most beauty queen ready for secret love story beach party.

Features:
* Makeover section: Apply different colors shadow, give hair style choose a blush on, Apply lipstick, Put on eye liner, Finish with a mascara in salon.
* Dressing room: Choose a gorgeous pretty designer dresses.
* Plentiful designer shoes of different styles.
* Get killer beauty makeover with your BFF’s or summer crush! You'll rock your new makeup and hairstyle!
* No beauty makeover is complete without a manicure!
